review_text: With grandchildren, this is the perfect combination of colorful and functional.  These are the perfect size for juice, water for taking medicine with, or when you don't want them to have too much of a good thing.  I bought two sets and had my daughter take one home for their use at home.  Love them.
product_name: Ikea Kalas 101.929.56 BPA-Free Tumbler, Assorted Colors, 6-Pack, Set of 2
